title: Repeat: Tig Notaro
description: Samantha Bee sits down with comedian Tig Notaro to talk about loving old people, cats that nurse raccoons, and her new animated comedy special, Drawn. Plus, Tig invites Sam's whole family to stay with her! Original release date: September 14th, 2021.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
